As a result of a nasty divorce, I have lost all my Japanese items. 
One in particulat that bothers me is a handout I received on one of 
my visits to the Shrine of the 47 Samurai. (Near the Takanawa hotel.) 
Can someone provide me a source for the names, ages, and other 
relevant information about these 47 Samarai?
